= User Guide: How to erase old/unwanted data =

to erase the data for a toon;
  * open the bag window
  * click on the Switch Character icon
  * mouse over the toon you wish to erase the data for
  * chose either erase bag data or erase all data

if you wish to erase data for a different area, eg the bank, you will need to open the bank window first.

if you wish to erase vault data you will need to open the vault window first.

you can erase data in offline mode, you do not have to be logged into that particular toon.
